name: Maid in Wonderland
description:
Maid in Wonderland is a short, story oriented puzzle game,  current version was made for Igmc 2018 so it is only demo, but i hope to develop it more in the future!

Features:

  • Explore the mysterious city Ebermah and get to know its residents,
  • game available in 2 languages: English and Polish!
  • around 1 hour of gameplay,
  • Cast of colorful and likeable characters,
  • Cute artstyle(i think!),
  • Maids!
  • jazz,
  • Day and night cycle,
  • Monster girls!! (And boys),
  • and bunny in a vending machine.
